 10#ifndef VSIP_CORE_DISPATCH_TAGS_HPP
 11#define VSIP_CORE_DISPATCH_TAGS_HPP
 12
 13namespace vsip_csl
 14{
 15namespace dispatcher
 16{
 17/// backend tags
 18namespace be
 19{
 20/// Hook for custom evaluators
 21struct user;
 22/// Intel IPP Library
 23struct intel_ipp;
 24/// Optimized Matrix Transpose
 25struct transpose;
 26/// Mercury SAL Library
 27struct mercury_sal;
 28/// IBM CBE SDK.
 29struct cbe_sdk;
 30/// IBM Cell Math Library
 31struct cml;
 32/// Builtin SIMD routines (non loop fusion)
 33struct simd_builtin;
 34/// Dense multi-dim expr reduction
 35struct dense_expr;
 36/// Optimized Copy
 37struct copy;
 38/// Special expr handling (vmmul, etc)
 39struct op_expr;
 40/// SIMD Loop Fusion.
 41struct simd_loop_fusion;
 42struct simd_unaligned_loop_fusion;
 43/// Fused Fastconv RBO evaluator.
 44struct fc_expr;
 45/// Return-block expression evaluator.
 46struct rbo_expr;
 47/// Multi-dim expr reduction
 48struct mdim_expr;
 49/// Generic Loop Fusion (base case).
 50struct loop_fusion;
 51/// FFTW3.
 52struct fftw3;
 53/// Dummy FFT
 54struct no_fft;
 55
 56/// BLAS implementation (ATLAS, MKL, etc)
 57struct blas;
 58/// LAPACK implementation (ATLAS, MKL, etc)
 59struct lapack;
 60/// Generic implementation.
 61struct generic;
 62/// Parallel implementation.
 63struct parallel;
 64/// C-VSIPL library.
 65struct cvsip;
 66/// NVidia CUDA GPU library
 67struct cuda;
 68/// Optimized Tag.struct 
 69struct opt;
 70
 71} // namespace vsip_csl::dispatcher::be
 72
 73/// Operation tags
 74namespace op
 75{
 76template <dimension_type D,        /// dimension
 77	  typename I,              /// input type
 78	  typename O,              /// output type
 79	  int S,                   /// special dimension
 80	  return_mechanism_type R, /// return-mechanism type
 81	  unsigned N>              /// number of times
 82struct fft;
 83template <typename I,              /// input type
 84	  typename O,              /// output type
 85	  int A,                   /// axis
 86	  int D,                   /// direction
 87	  return_mechanism_type R, /// return-mechanism type
 88	  unsigned N>              /// number of times
 89struct fftm;
 90struct fir;
 91struct freqswap;
 92struct hist;
 93/// dot-product
 94struct dot;
 95/// outer-product
 96struct outer;
 97/// matrix product
 98struct prod;
 99/// conjugate matrix product
100struct prodj;
101/// generalized matrix-matrix product
102struct gemp;
103/// lower-upper linear system solver
104struct lud;
105/// QR decomposition
106struct qrd;
107/// Cholesky solver
108struct chold;
109/// singular value decomposition
110struct svd;
111
112} // namespace vsip_csl::dispatcher::op
113} // namespace vsip_csl::dispatcher
114} // namespace vsip_csl
